oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General Order No. 18
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: General Order No. 18 pertaining to the surrender and pacification of Confederate forces. No. 18, issued by Gen. J. E. Johnston, notes that the war has "imposed on the General the duty of sparing the blood of this gallant army and saving our country from further desolation and ruin." Transcribed. Joseph Warren Van Meter (1837-1903), Co. K, 7th Arkansas Infantry Regiment and Co. E, 1st Arkansas Infantry Regiment, CSA."
